lines.text: There's a word for you.
There are several for you.
Dave, that drug you brought...
It's not a drug, it's an Acid
It isn't as though I'd taken out a pistol and shot her or taken a knife and stabbed her, is it doc?
If you kill anybody deliberately, it's murder. No matter how you do it.
Unless what, Dave?
Suppose a person couldn't possibly scream?
Well everybody can scream.
A deaf mute can't scream.
The only way Dave Morris will marry my sister is over my dead body.
Unconventional but not impossible.
I'm tired, I think I'll go to bed.
Stay up a bit, who knows? The next time you go to sleep it might be forever.
I'm worried David, Isabel has been sweet to me all morning.
Me too, she even said hello, she even smiled.
So look out, the roof is going to fall in.

The tingler exists in every human being, we now know. Look at that tingler, Dave. It's an ugly and dangerous thing-ugly because it's the creation of man's fear; dangerous because... because a frightened man is dangerous.
Ladies and gentlemen, please do not panic! But SCREAM! Scream for your lives!
Ladies and gentlemen, just a word of warning. If any of you are not convinced that you have a tingler of your own, the next time you're frightened in the dark... don't scream.
Remember, if you scream at just the right time, it might just save your life.

[opens Ollie's bag and finds a mask and hatchet in it]
You killed her.
No I didn't...
Your wife was frightened to death, by this, and this.

[about Martha]
She won't leave anyone alone with that safe.
You gave me the idea, doc.
Just because poisons exist, is no reason to use them.
I had nothing to do with my father's death, and you can't prove that I did.
Would you like me to prove it isn't nonsense?
You can't prove it. Anwyay there isn't anything to prove.
But you wouldn't like me to try. And you should remember this, organic poisons are like old soldiers, they never die, they just lie smoldering in the grave, and I'm not bad at autopsies either.
Either you give Lucy half of all the money you have and leave her alone, or you commit suicide right now.
Suicide? You mean murder.
When I finish rearranging things, it'll look like suicide.
I came because I was a bit worried about your wife, a shock like that can have bad after effects you know.
You know I've been worried about her too, she hasn't eaten hardly a thing and she can't sleep. Ever since she saw that blood, she just roams around the theater all night.
You say get a cat, get a cat, you say get a dog, I got a dog.
We don't need him, come on I want to show you something.
Bet you in a fair fight that cat could lick this dog.
